lead_paragraph: Officials hope to avoid a crush that could leave some Americans frustrated with no passport in hand on the day they planned to travel.
snippet: Officials hope to avoid a crush that could leave some Americans frustrated with no passport in hand on the day they planned to travel.

headline.main: Passport Expiring Soon? Renew It Now, State Dept. Says
headline.print_headline: Surge in Passport Demand Expected This Year

abstract: State Dept is urging Americans planning to travel outside country in 2016 to apply for passports, or renewals, as soon as possible; officials anticipate flood of renewal requests for 10-year passports issued in 2006 and 2007, first years passports were required in order to return from Canada, Mexico, Caribbean and Bahamas.
